name: aima
author: David Pomerenke
description: Implementation of Russell & Norvig, "Artificial Intelligence - A Modern Approach".

scripts.test: coffee --compile --inline-map --output test.mjs README.litcoffee && node --require source-map-support/register test.mjs
scripts.prepare: npm run coverage && npm run build
scripts.build: cat README.litcoffee | sed -e 's/^.*# testing only$//g' | coffee --stdio --literate --compile --transpile > index.mjs
scripts.dev: coffee --compile --inline-map --output dev.mjs dev.coffee && node --require source-map-support/register dev.mjs
